<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77950</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77950</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>5d1cbf45-4efa-462c-9ed5-5dbdea0c13e7#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hőmérsékletváltozások melegítés során</string>
            <string language="en">changes in temperature during warming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ändert in der Temperatur während des Wärmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">change dans la température pendant le chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">muda na temperatura durante aquecer-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambia nella temperatura durante il 
riscaldamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλλαγές στη θερμοκρασία κατά τη διάρκεια της 
θέρμανσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambia en temperatura durante calentarse</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A melegítés közben bekövetkező hőmérsékletváltozások (grafikus követés)</string>
            <string language="en">changes in temperature during warming</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">olvadáspont,  forráspont,  fagyás,  olvadás,  forrás,  </string>
            <string language="en">melting-point , boiling-point,  freezing,  melting,  boiling,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderungen in der Temperatur während des 
Wärmens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changements de la température pendant le 
chauffage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudanças na temperatura durante aquecer-se</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamenti nella temperatura durante il 
riscaldamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλλαγές στη θερμοκρασία κατά τη διάρκεια της 
θέρμανσης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambios en temperatura durante calentarse</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schmelzpunkt, Kochenpunkt, frierend, Schmelzen ein und 
kochen,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">melting-point, bouillir-point, gelant, fonte, bouillant,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">melting-point, ferv-ponto, congelando-se, derretimento, 
fervendo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">melting-point, boll-punto, congelando, fondersi, 
bollente,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειώνω-σημείο, βράζω-σημείο, πάγωμα, τήξη, που βράζει,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">punto de fusión, hervir-punta, congelando, el 
derretir, hirviendo,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77950</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=5d1cbf45-4efa-462c-9ed5-5dbdea0c13e7&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
